txt.en: 'These forges must be cleared of everything valuable.  Mazog's orders!'
'There is no time to waste.  The war will begin soon!'
'What Mazog says, must be done!  We must make more Black Powder!'
'Be careful with powder.  No more accidents!'
'Get them!'
'You think you can sneak by me without being noticed?  Think again!'
'Protect the boss!  Smash little ones!'
'So be it!  We will have to remedy this situation!'
'You will not harm these two.'
'Does this mean you wish to fight?'
'This is our forge now, [placeholder]!  Go back or I will see that you never return!'
Once Nark√ª is killed, you can use this chest.
Once Dhaub is killed, you can use this chest.
'I said I wished not to be disturbed!  This had better be good!'
Once Thrug is killed, you can use this chest.
Krankluk shouts, 'You have wasted too much time!  You make me angry!'
Once Krankluk is killed, you can use this chest.
'Intruders!  Stop them!  They must not enter the Forges!'
'A true fight!  I haven't had this much fun in ages!'
'Don't let anyone past.  We must keep this Forge clear of pesky intruders.'
'Stay clear of those trolls, maggots.  They will crush you.'
'I saw a troll get crushed in a cave-in. Ha!'
'Get the powder away from me.  It burns!'
'Help us, Master!'
'Master, I am hurt!'
'Fire, fire, fire!'
'Dance!'
Hi!
'The fire will burn you all!'
'Run away! Flee from the flames!'
'Stand still a moment.'
'Get those rocks cleared!  We need to make way for the trolls!'
'Does it hurt?  Good!'
'Hurry, grunts!  This area is too unstable for powder!'
Krankluk shouts, 'Come to me and face your doom or your reward will be nothing!'
'It has come to this.  You give me no choice but to unleash the full fury of this forge!'
'You take any longer and I will flay your hides!'
'Simple, eh?  Is that all you can say?'
'This is growing quite tedious!  Time to bring in the reinforcements!'
'Now, die!'
'Dhaub does not know defeat!'
